entries.title: Kari Lake Mocked by Columnists From Arizona's Largest Newspaper
entries.description: Lake continues to call herself "the duly elected governor" of Arizona despite her opponent, Katie Hobbs, already being sworn in.

entries.title: Liz Cheney Posts Eerie Trump Quote After McCarthy Thanks Former President
entries.description: Cheney, who once worked side-by-side with McCarthy in GOP leadership, posted veiled criticism against the newly-elected House speaker.

entries.title: Powerball Drawing for 01/07/23, Saturday Jackpot Is $325 Million
entries.description: Saturday night's Powerball has a cash-value option worth $165.2 million.

entries.title: Idaho Roommate 'Passed Out' After Seeing Suspect, Former FBI Agent Suggests
entries.description: Critics argue that the roommate, Dylan Mortensen, should have called police immediately after encountering an unknown person in the Moscow, Idaho, home.

entries.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Shares House Republicans' First Priority
entries.description: House Republicans revealed what their first bill will be after a tumultuous speaker vote.

entries.title: Lauren Boebert Issues Warning After GOP's Speaker Battle
entries.description: The GOP lawmaker tweeted on Saturday that people need to "wait" and see what Republicans have in store for "Joe Biden and the radical left."

entries.title: McCarthy Thanking Trump 2 Years After Jan. 6 Was 'Disgusting': Ex-GOP Rep.
entries.description: "Kind of a disgusting moment right there," David Jolly said Saturday. "And it also shows exactly the kind of person Kevin McCarthy is."

entries.title: Trump Indictment for Mar-a-Lago Documents Coming 'Soon,' Attorney Predicts
entries.description: Former federal prosecutor Cynthia Alksne said Saturday that the classified documents case is "easy prosecution" for the DOJ.

entries.title: Josh Hawley's 'Prominent' Jan. 6 Role, 'Lies' Blasted by Home State Papers
entries.description: Hawley was a prominent member of the GOP "Sedition Caucus" who called into doubt the results of the 2020 presidential election.

entries.title: Katie Porter Goes Viral for Reading This Book During Chaotic Speaker Fight
entries.description: Many Twitter users praised the Democratic congresswoman, who also donned an orange blouse that matched the book's cover.

entries.title: Hakeem Jeffries A-Z House Speech Viewed 2.4 Million Times
entries.description: A speech by Hakeem Jeffries conceding the House Speaker election to Kevin McCarthy has gone viral online.

entries.title: Kohberger's Alleged Actions Show 'Complete Consciousness of Guilt': Lawyer
entries.description: The surveillance team watching Kohberger saw him clean his car "top to bottom" while visiting his parents in Pennsylvania.

entries.title: Shelling of Bakhmut Killed Civilians Despite Putin's Christmas Truce—Kyiv
entries.description: Ukraine had rejected the Russian president's call for a temporary ceasefire over the Orthodox Christmas period.

entries.title: Was Bryan Kohberger Hiding in Plain Sight? Online Sleuth Theory Goes Viral
entries.description: There is speculation the Idaho murderer could be linked to two social media accounts who discussed the case at length online.

entries.title: Moscow Sees Growing 'Split in Power' Amid Putin's War: Ex-Russian Commander
entries.description: Igor Girkin, a pro-war Russian nationalist, slammed Kremlin leadership on Saturday for "cherishing the idiotic hope of a 'final compromise.'"

entries.title: Ginni Thomas Video Complaining About 'Resistance' to Elections Resurfaces
entries.description: Thomas told the House January 6 committee that she believed the 2020 presidential election was stolen from former President Donald Trump.

entries.title: Russia Losses in Ukraine Surpass New Milestone
entries.description: The Ukrainian armed forces said that more than 110,000 Russian troops had been killed since the start of the war on February 24.

entries.title: Barstool Sportsbook Ohio Promo: $1,000 Bonus for NFL Week 18 Saturday Games
entries.description: This Barstool Sportsbook Ohio promo offers prospective players a $1,000 bonus for new users who wager on either of the NFL Week 18 Saturday games.

entries.title: Trump Criminal Cases 'Can Be Proved' Beyond Reasonable Doubt: Kirschner
entries.description: "Where in the hell is the Department of Justice?" former prosecutor Glenn Kirschner asked on Friday. "It's absurd...I know evidence of guilt when I see it."

entries.title: Video of Mike Rogers Held Back as He Lunges at Matt Gaetz Viewed 2.1M Times
entries.description: Not long after the tense exchange, Representative Kevin McCarthy, a California Republican, finally won the House speaker position.

entries.title: McCarthy Jibe About Hitting Pelosi With Gavel Resurface After Speaker Vote
entries.description: It was House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries, and not Nancy Pelosi, who handed the speaker's gavel to McCarthy early Saturday morning.

entries.title: Golden Retriever Sniffs Out Owner Hiding Inside Sofa in Adorable Video
entries.description: Several users on TikTok praised the dog for being "so smart" and being good at "playing hide and seek."

entries.title: Ukrainian Troops Will Start Patriot Missile Training Later This Month
entries.description: The White House said that the weapons wouldn't provide an "an immediate term capability," but would be effective in a few months.

entries.title: Passengers Hit by Freak Waterfall as Cruise Ship Steers to Avoid Raft—Video
entries.description: Cruise liner Harmony of the Seas experienced a surprise waterfall on Tuesday after dodging a suspected refugee raft.

entries.title: Fan Spots 'Titanic' Easter Egg in 'Frozen': 'Never Seen Anyone Find This'
entries.description: "It's so funny," commented one TikTok user, while another just wrote: "WOAH WOAH WOAH WOAH."

entries.title: Playful Kitten Skittles, Who Loves Watching Birds, Wins Pet of the Week
entries.description: "His playfulness is so cute and entertaining," Skittles' owner said.

entries.title: How To Manifest Your Dream Partner
entries.description: A dating expert has shared a five-step guide that will help you manifest your perfect partner.

entries.title: Moment Kevin McCarthy Confronts Matt Gaetz Viewed 1.6 Million Times
entries.description: McCarthy won election as speaker on the 15th ballot, with Gaetz and other opponents choosing to vote "present."

entries.title: Idaho Killer Was First Timer Who Made 'Sloppy' Mistakes—Criminologist
entries.description: The Idaho student murderer is unlikely to have killed before because he was "sloppy," according to a criminologist.

entries.title: Putin Delivers Christmas Message as Fighting Continues Despite Cease-Fire
entries.description: The Orthodox Public Affairs Committee condemned the Russian leader's call for a temporary truce.

entries.title: My Husband Loves Another Woman, But I Don't Want Divorce—What Should I Do?
entries.description: "In 2019 my husband admitted to being in love with this woman and he sends her money from time to time and also claims to be the godfather of her children."

entries.title: Idaho Prosecutors Will Seek Death Penalty In Kohberger Trial, Says Judge
entries.description: Prosecutors are likely to seek the death penalty for Bryan Kohberger, who is accused of murdering four Idaho University students, according to Belvin Perry.

entries.title: Pictured: Marjorie Taylor Greene's 'Perfect Phone Call' From Trump
entries.description: Greene was a consistent supporter of Kevin McCarthy as he fought to be elected speaker of the House of Representatives.

entries.title: Prince Harry Suing U.K. Tabloid Over 'Illegal' Reporting on Princess Diana
entries.description: Prince Harry's "private information was misused" after "illegal actions directed against his mother" by a U.K. tabloid, his lawyers say.

entries.title: Ukrainian Forces Face Being Surrounded By Wagner Troops in Bakhmut—ISW
entries.description: The financier of the mercenaries fighting for Moscow Yevgeny Prigozhin is taking all the credit for gains in the Donetsk oblast city fought over for months.

entries.title: Donald Trump and Kevin McCarthy Share Love-In After 'Crazy' Speaker Race
entries.description: McCarthy said that nobody should doubt the former president's "influence" following his victory in the speaker's race.

entries.title: 'A Near Death Experience Lead Me On A Path I Never Expected'
entries.description: In an original Newsweek essay, Julia A. Nicholson talks about a near death experience that changed her life.

entries.title: 'The Diagnosis I Told My Family Saved Their Lives'
entries.description: My family could talk about anything on the planet. But there was one thing we couldn't talk about.

entries.title: Gavin Newsom's California Electric Car Push Faces Huge Hurdles
entries.description: All new cars sold in California will have to be free of fossil fuels by 2035, but experts and stakeholders have pinpointed the key roadblocks the policy faces.

entries.title: Wordle Today #567 Clues, Hints and Answer for Saturday, January 7 Game
entries.description: Newsweek has some hints and tips to help you crack today's Wordle puzzle.

entries.title: Kevin McCarthy Breaks Silence After Winning Vote: 'I Will Never Give Up'
entries.description: Six of McCarthy's Republican opponents voted "present" during the final late night ballot that secured him the speakership.

entries.title: Putin's War Plan Reaching 'Critical Moment'—Ukraine Ambassador
entries.description: Vadym Prystaiko said Kyiv must "fight through" to victory and urged foreign partners to ignore Russian cease-fire proposals.

entries.title: Matt Gaetz Says He 'Ran Out of Stuff to Ask For' From McCarthy
entries.description: Gaetz, who voted "present" as McCarthy was elected House speaker, compared negotiations with the GOP leader to the drafting of a "prenuptial agreement."

entries.title: Kevin McCarthy Secures Speakership: Here's What to Look Out for Next
entries.description: On the fifth day of voting, McCarthy finally clinched enough votes to be elected speaker of the House, opening up the path for legislative processes to begin.

entries.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Says 'Head on Platter' to MAGA Should Be McConnell's
entries.description: Greene tweeted while the House was adjourned after a 13th vote failed to produce the next speaker for the chamber.

entries.title: Parent Calls Out U.S. Gun Laws as Boy, 6, in Custody in Teacher's Shooting
entries.description: A 6-year-old boy was arrested, accused of shooting his first-grade teacher in an "altercation" on Friday.

entries.title: Liz Cheney Says U.S. Will 'Suffer' if McCarthy Concedes on Defense
entries.description: McCarthy told reporters after the 13th speaker vote that he believes lawmakers will "finish this once and for all" when the House reconvenes Friday night.

entries.title: Video Shows Arrest of Ashli Babbitt's Mother During Protest Outside Capitol
entries.description: U.S. Capitol Police said Micki Witthoeft was detained for blocking traffic on the second anniversary of the Capitol riot.
